comments.author: Dave
comments.body: I haven't committed a decent felony lately, unless you include my cooking. Anyone up for Back Alley? Give me a buzz; 2-2672. Noon-ish. DU

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Greg and I didn't have the gutz to do hard time today, so we stayed away from Back Alley. Boxed Boulder instead. Great ride. Thanks for pulling me around the county, Greg! DU
